alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Orange; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 12:55PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong wind gusts will impact portions of central Brevard, southeastern Orange and northern Osceola Counties through 130 PM EST... At 1252 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary pushing southeast at 25 mph across central Brevard and northern OSceola counties. Showers and storms along and ahead of this boundary will move toward the east northeast at 30 to 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Melbourne, Saint Cloud, Rockledge, Cocoa and Cocoa Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these showers and embedded storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
